contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=November 2006}} '''''X Factor''''', the [[Iceland]]ic version of the popular [[United Kingdom|British]] television show '''''[[The X Factor (TV series)|The X Factor]]''''' premiered [[Reykjavík]] on November 17, 2006. The host is actress [[Halla Vilhjálmsdóttir]] and the judges are [[talent agent]] and businessman [[Einar Bárðarson]], rock musician [[Elínborg Halldórsdóttir]] and pop singer [[Paul Oscar]]. Einar and Páll Óskar were both judges in ''[[Idol stjörnuleit]]'', the Icelandic version of ''[[Pop Idol]]''. The finals were held in [[Vetrargarðinum]] (roughly translated as Wintergarden) which is in [[Smáralind]], the largest [[shopping center]] in [[Iceland]]. The winner was [[Faroe Islands|Faroese]] singer and hair dresser, [[Jógvan Hansen]]. {{The X Factor series}} {{DEFAULTSORT:X Factor (Iceland)}} [[Category:The X Factor (TV series)|Iceland]] [[Category:Television series by FremantleMedia]] {{Iceland-stub}} {{Reality-tv-prog-stub}}
